body_html:
I saw this and did the following:
./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
Then added: HOST_NSYNC_LIB=pwd/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.linux.c++11/nsync.a at the end of my make command.
body_text:
I saw this and did the following:
./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
Then added: HOST_NSYNC_LIB=pwd/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.linux.c++11/nsync.a at the end of my make command.
body:
I saw this and did the following:
./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_nsync.sh
Then added: HOST_NSYNC_LIB=`pwd`/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/builds/default.linux.c++11/nsync.a at the end of my make command.
